query:
INSERT INTO taskChecklists (taskId, templateId, stage, status)
SELECT t.id, 1, 'pre_execution', 'pending'
FROM tasks t
WHERE t.name = 'งานฐานราก' AND t.id NOT IN (SELECT taskId FROM taskChecklists WHERE templateId = 1)
UNION ALL
SELECT t.id, 2, 'in_progress', 'pending'
FROM tasks t
WHERE t.name = 'งานฐานราก' AND t.id NOT IN (SELECT taskId FROM taskChecklists WHERE templateId = 2)
UNION ALL
SELECT t.id, 3, 'post_execution', 'pending'
FROM tasks t
WHERE t.name = 'งานฐานราก' AND t.id NOT IN (SELECT taskId FROM taskChecklists WHERE templateId = 3);
